description: This application receives words and sentences from a stream and uses flowlets in a flow to process the sentences and store the results and statistics in datasets. For information on running the application, see http://docs.cask.co/cdap/4.1.0/en/examples-manual/examples/word-count.html
label: Word Count Example
author: Cask

arguments.name: steps
value: Upload the JAR in the next step
